tool_description: Delivers all valid and unique URLs contained on a web page.
name: Url Scraper
title: Url Scraper

api_list.name: url
api_list.description: Give a url in body of call and retrieve all unique urls as an array contained on the page as an array.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://url-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://url-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com/url"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "url-scraper1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
